climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 【Dry Baby Wipes】Each wipe size - 7.9 * 7.5 inches, which can wrap the baby's buttocks maximally without getting your hands dirty. Our baby soft wipes are made of 100% plant-based fibers that are extra-absorbent, soft and tear-resistant

【Wet and Dry Use】 Can dry the face with cotton soft tissue, can be used instead of towel; immersed in water will turn into wet wipes, absorb water after the ductility is excellent, will not tear, can be recycled to clean other items

【Travel Baby Wipes】Whether at home or on the go, be able to use these unscented baby wipes. The sensitive baby wipes can be used to wipe baby's face, hands, buttocks, etc. and are extremely cleansing, removing all stains
【Multipurpose】Can be used for any purpose, including diaper changes, meals, nursing, or runny noses and mouths
【Travel Friendly】For both at home and on the go. Dispose after use to avoid keeping dirty wash cloths in your diaper bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes. Since they are dry they are very versatile. I can add water or a wile mixture and make my own wipes or just use them dry. Nice and soft and absorbent. Great for blowing noses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have been using these quite a bit since our son was born! All the way from cleaning up spot, wiping the booty, to wetting and using as warm compresses from clogged tear ducts. Very multipurpose, soft, and nice to keep in your diaper caddy :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These wipes are Amazing!
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are Awesome! There is no lint left behind after wiping surfaces. They are soft enough to wash your face with, & have a light texture that helps get skin clean. They don’t fall apart while using, & are strong enough to rinse out & continue to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, price getting out of control
reviews.reviewText: I was really happy with the Happy Bum Bum wipes, but am quite bummed that the price has recently skyrocketed. (Yeah I know dad jokes)We recently brought our twin girls home, and one of them had a bit of sensitivity to some of the wipes we tried. I found these dry wipes on Amazon, and for about $20 thought the price was reasonable.The dry wipes are a little smaller than most of the wet wipes we use, but just big enough to get the job done. The wipes themselves are both soft and very strong.The wipes are great when wet and used as a wet wipe, but also very useful when dry cleaning up your little one's mouth after spit ups. Because these are made from 100% cotton, they are very absorbent.The only problem is the price keeps going up. After I ran out of these wipes and went to buy more, I balked at the price increase. I ended up buying a bunch of medline ultrasoft wipes. After using the medline wipes, I realized how nice these Happy Bum Bum ones are. The medline ones are made from polyester and rayon, and wick up moisture instead of absorbing like the Happy Bum Bum ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use with every change! Updated:
reviews.reviewText: Changed my review to 5 stars. I initially gave 4 because I didn't realize there was a perforated strip on the top of the pack that easily dispenses the wipe. Only wish I would have realized it sooner!When my baby was born, the hospital gave us dry wipes to use. Confused, we brought in some wet wipes from home. We quickly realized how nice dry wipes are. We ran out of what they sent us home with, and I came across these after reading several good reviews compared to other brands, and I liked the price.I change her happily knowing my baby's completely dry when I put her barrier cream and new diaper on, preventing rashes. They're great for spills and having handy if you need to apply creams. They're good for cleaning baby's mouth out. So many uses. I keep these near all over the house.Waiting for another 50% off promo. I'm nearly out of my 3rd box since baby came home. We go through about 1box per month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have them on subscribe. As they are the best. I use only these for my baby. So soft and doesn't irritate my babys skin at all.
